result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kari L Bryant
Current: R14390 Mountain Bay Rd, Ringle, WI 54471 United States  (Effective: 06-10-2014)
Prior: R14390 Mountain Bay Rd., Ringle, WI 54471

w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
INCLUDES 13CF1069, 14CF199, 14CF314 (filed in 14CF314)

Case called: 11:42am. INCLUDES 13CF1069, 14CF199, 14CF314. Clerk: Denise. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster & ADA Chad Minder. Defendant appears by Atty Rick Cveykus. *VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to amend ct 1 (strangulation) to 1 ct of misd battery (940.19(1) 13CF1069- crt grants. State moves to DRI ct 2 (resisting/obstructing) 13CF1069- crt grants. State moves to DRI ct 1 (bj/felony) 14CF199- crt grants. State moves to DRI 14CF314- crt grants.  PLEA: NO CONTEST - amend ct 1 (misd battery); ct 3 (dc) 13CF1069; ct 2 (retail theft) 14CF199. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  COURT ORDERS: SWH - 18 months probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: LEAP Program; Counseling; Court Costs; 1 DNA Surcharge on 14CF199. Crt remits any DNA costs in 13CF1069. Adjourned: 11:54am.
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection

Clerk Cheree
Cases 13CF1069, 14CF199 and 14CF314 called: 1:31pm
State appears by ADA L.Pluster.  Def appears in person and with Atty Rick Cveykus.  
(Originally set for Plea in older cases)

Parties request adjournment to reach global resolution of all cases to include the new file 14CF314 - COURT Grants and advises parties they must set matters all for PTC and Prelim on new file.

Atty Cveykus requests amending conditions of bond, of no abusive contact with defendant's daughter, and follow any recommendations with DSS; State notes argument on request for amendment of conditions of bond.

COURT does not modify bond as there is no information from DSS -- COURT will address bond again if parties can get information from DSS on issue.

PTC set for 4/21 at 9:20am

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim(s): A.H.B. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
